subject: Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The $400,000 Lady’s Secret Stakes, which will be run on Saturday, has lured Rachel Alexandra, the 2009 Horse of the Year, to Monmouth Park.
snippet: The $400,000 Lady’s Secret Stakes, which will be run on Saturday, has lured Rachel Alexandra, the 2009 Horse of the Year, to Monmouth Park.
